questions.question: Here are some steps to prevent identity theft, except?
A sign which may detect identity theft is?

choices.answer: Bank withdrawal appropriate with victim behavior
Notification from the application about compromised information

questions.question: Here is the consequence of losing data, except?

choices.answer: The cost of buying new hardware
The cost of regenerating the lost data
The cost of informing an unauthorized party
The cost of enduring because the data is missing

questions.question: The statement regarding the identity theft below is incorrect

choices.answer: Persuade the victim to leak the information
Copy the authorized data to the flash drive
